title: Assess Schedule Impact of a Change Order
description: A client-approved change order to add a new room will add 10 days of work. A PM must assess the impact on the project's completion date.

tasks.description: Retrieve the details of the approved change order, noting the 10-day duration for the added scope.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the duration of the new work.

tasks.description: Incorporate the new tasks into the project schedule and analyze the impact on the critical path.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the schedule and finds that the project completion date is delayed by 10 days.
